GameplayTagList.DevComment: Entity state tags
Entity is alive; required for most ability activations
Entity is stunned; blocks ability activation
Entity is disarmed; blocks melee ability activation
Entity has an active damage buff (granted by effect.buff.damage)
Root tag for ability activation state
Entity is casting a spell (owned tag for fireball ability)
Entity is blocking (owned tag for block ability)
Entity is attacking; blocks block ability and cancels it when added
Root tag for cooldown tracking
Fireball is on cooldown (granted by effect.cooldown.fireball)
Attack is on cooldown (granted by effect.cooldown.attack)
Spell is on cooldown (granted by effect.cooldown.spell)
Heal is on cooldown (granted by effect.cooldown.heal)
Root tag for active effect tracking
Heal over time effect is active (granted by effect.heal.overtime)
Root tag for buff effects
Attack buff is active (granted by effect.buff.attack)
Defense buff is active (granted by effect.buff.defense)
Root tag for debuff effects
Poison debuff is active (granted by effect.debuff.poison)
